About the Company: Stylam Industries Ltd initially engaged in the manufacture of luxury grade decorative laminated sheets for both home and industry use, has now started manufacturing industrial as well as advanced grade laminates i.e. Postforming and Antistatic laminates under the brand name StYLAM.The product range of the company includes High Pressure Decorative Laminates,Industrial Laminates Paper Based and Phenolic Becker.
